articles.author: David Ljunggren
articles.title: Canada wildfire: all 20000 Yellowknife residents evacuating - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Canadian fire crews on Thursday battled to prevent wildfires from reaching the northern city of Yellowknife, where all 20,000 residents are <a href="/world/americas/british-columbia-wildfire-strands-some-150-people-lodge-cbc-2023-08-16/">leaving by car and pl…
articles.content: Aug 17 (Reuters) - Canadian fire crews on Thursday battled to prevent wildfires from reaching the northern city of Yellowknife, where all 20,000 residents are leaving by car and plane after an evacua… [+5662 chars]
